attributes.action: make a noise about noisy neighbours - please make recommendations to Warrington local councils on arguments and use of equipment time scheedules
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Did you know ? 

As men age, they get less and less deep sleep. In fact, a recent study quoted in the Journal of the American Medical Association stated men in their 30s and 40s get 82% less deep sleep than men in their 20s. By the time they reach 45, men experience almost no deep sleep. 

Women, on the other hand, enjoy more deep sleep than men, but that advantage vanishes once they reach menopause. 

Why is this a big deal? 

Probably because a) half of parliament is asleep half of the time b) half of my neighbours keep me awake for the other half.

The petitioner is calling on the P.M. to campaign (quietly) on this matter and urge local councils to instruct ASBO neighbours - please make tougher penalties on noise and enforce them.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
